author: felicity
msg: Made some adjustments to the razor2 cf range stuff -- we should ignore
a cf of 0 since that means "not in razor", etc.

author: felicity
msg: Added code to do Razor2 'cf' (confidence) range checking.  I'm not sure
exactly how it'll interact with RAZOR2_CHECK since that should take into
account the user's min_cf setting, but ...
Remove some useless $fulltext stuff w/ Razor1 and 2 as well (why set
the variable if you're not going to use it?)

So 80% had a super confidence level, 10% was very high, and 10% was
The default for users, BTW, is a min_cf setting of 1.
